verses.1: Pasian, i belh leh i thahatna hi a, haksat hunin a hong huh pahpah pa ahi hi.
verses.2: Tua ahih ciangin, leitung kikhiinin, mualte tuipi sung a kidenna zongin, a tuite ging zuazua-in phuan zuazua a, hih ginna hangin mual liante a liing zongin, i lau kei ding hi.
verses.4: Sangpen paʼ teenna khua siangtho, Pasianʼ khuapi, a lungdamsak gun khat a om hi.
verses.5: Ama laizang ah Pasian om a, amah a kiliing kei ding hi. Pasian in phalvak tungin amah huh ding hi.
verses.6: Minamte lungkham uh a, kumpi gamte kiliing hi. Ama aw ging khiasak a, leitung kicim gawp hi.
verses.7: Vanglian Topa eite tawh hong om khawm a, Jakob Pasian eima belh ahi hi.
verses.8: Hong pai unla, Topaʼ sepna hong mu un. Leitung khempeuh gam khing a suahsak khitna hong en un.
verses.9: Amah in leimong dongah gal beisak hi. Amah in thalpi kuaitanin teipi susia a, leengte mei tawh a hal tum hi.
verses.10: “Om hithiat unla, Pasian ka hihna thei un. Minamte lakah keimah hong kisangsak a, leitung khempeuh ah ka min hong kithangsak hi,” a ci hi.
verses.11: Vanglian Topa, eite tawh hong om khawm a, Jakobʼ Pasian, eima belh ahi hi.
